attributes.action: Give Ireland There Six Counties Back
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For hundreds of years there has been a "feud" over Ireland And Britain. I Think that this feud has got to far and that those six counties we stole from Ireland, we should give back. We have plenty of counties in Britain why do we need more? I say we should give Ireland what is rightfully there's, there freedom, and the peace.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
